title: Introducing: Sopha
body:
To tell the truth, I’m not great with this style of music, and I’m not too up on my German indie bands either, so **Sopha** is a tricky one for me from the off.

An all girl four piece from Hannover, taking their name from the item of furniture upon which most of their music was pieced together (I think… thanks Google translate), their debut 7 track release, _**Golden Water**_ is a beautiful mix of otherworldly dreamy folk. There’s some gorgeous harmonies in here, most notably on _Mountains_ and closer _It Won’t Be Long_. Stream the latter below, and the full record underneath that.
